topic.title: Referring the CSS from args.css Parameter

ol.li: Edit the WebHelp transformation scenario, then open the Parameters tab.
Set the args.css parameter to the path of your custom CSS file.
Also, set the args.copycss parameter to yes to automatically copy your custom CSS in the output folder when the transformation scenario is processed.
Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.

body.p: Result: Your custom CSS will be applied as a final layer on top of any existing CSS rules and the output will reflect the changes you made.
